entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.4°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 57 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this morning. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 70 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
